subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE
DEPOSITORY: of
A . semiscissus : Istituto Sperimentale
per la Zoologia Agraria, Firenze, Italy ; of
A . bicuspidatus
: not stated; of
A . limburgensis : Canadian
National Collection of Insects, Arachnids and Nematodes, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada ; of
A . sellnicki : Biologischen Zentralanstalt
Berlin der Deutschen Akademie der Landwirtschaftswissenschaften, Berlin Germany ; accession number 769 .

TYPE
LOCALITY AND HABITAT : of
A . semiscissus : Firenze
, Italy , in rotten substrate; of
A . bicuspidatus : Aschaffenburg
, Baviera, Germany , in groundwater; of
A . limburgensis : Castle
grounds, Neercanne, Limburg, The Netherlands , on
Agaricus campester
[Fungi: Agaricaceae ]; of
A . sellnicki : Versuchsfeld
der BZA (Biologischen Zentralanstalt Akademie), Teltow, Germany , in pasture soil.

NOTES : (a)
Hirschmann ( 1962 : 48 )
considered
Gamasellus ( Digamasellus ) eremita Berlese
to be a senior synonym of
A . bicuspidatus Willmann
, but this interpretation is not accepted in this publication; (b)
Bernhard ( 1963 : 151 )
suspected
L . ( I .) semiscissus
to be a senior synonym of
Lasioseius cetratus Sellnick
; (c)
Karg ( 1971 b: 273 )
considered
A . bispinatus
to be a junior synonym of both
A . cetratus
and
A . semiscissus
. We adopted the interpretation of
Evans ( 1955 : 289 )
, considering it to be a junior synonym of
A . cetratus
; (d)
Lindquist ( 1963
: 93 ; 1964 b: 3895 ) and
Farrier & Hennessey ( 1993 : 24 )
considered
Arctoseius limburgensis
Nesbitt, 1954
to be a junior synonym of
Arctoseius cetratus (Sellnick)
. We adopted the interpretation of Halliday et al . ( 1998 : 16 ), considering it a junior synonym
A . semiscissus
.
